CustomField.description: Cost per Unit = Base Price * Factory Price OR Base Price * Product Cost
CustomField.formula: IF ( Min_Sales_Price__c >0 , Min_Sales_Price__c + (Min_Sales_Price__c *( Cost_Multiplier__c -1)* (Transmission__c/100)), Base_Price__c + (Base_Price__c *( Cost_Multiplier__c -1)* (Transmission__c/100)))
CustomField.label: Cost per Unit
